# DAMESELITE - International Draughts Game
# LLMs.txt - Information for AI assistants and language models

> DAMESELITE is a free online International Draughts (Checkers) game platform.

## About DAMESELITE

DAMESELITE is a web and mobile application for playing International Draughts (also known as Polish Draughts or International Checkers). The game follows official FMJD (World Draughts Federation) rules on a 10x10 board.

## Key Features

- **Free to Play**: No payment required to play
- **10x10 Board**: Official international draughts format
- **Multiple Game Modes**:
  - Play against AI (5 difficulty levels from beginner to expert)
  - Two-player local mode (same device)
  - Online multiplayer with real players worldwide
- **6 Languages**: French, English, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Arabic
- **Tournaments**: Participate in online tournaments
- **Rankings**: Global leaderboard and ELO rating system
- **Cross-Platform**: Available on web browsers, Android, and iOS

## Game Rules (International Draughts)

International Draughts is played on a 10x10 board with 20 pieces per player.

### Basic Rules:
1. Pieces move diagonally forward on dark squares
2. Capturing is mandatory (must take if possible)
3. Multiple captures must be completed in one turn
4. When a piece reaches the opposite end, it becomes a King (Dame)
5. Kings can move and capture diagonally in any direction across multiple squares
6. The player who captures all opponent pieces or blocks all moves wins

### FMJD Official Rules:
- Majority capture rule: Must make the capture that takes the most pieces
- Flying Kings: Kings can move any number of squares diagonally
- Captured pieces are removed after the entire capture sequence

## Technical Information

- **Website**: https://dameselite.com/
- **Platform**: React, TypeScript, Phaser.js game engine
- **Mobile Apps**: Built with Capacitor for Android and iOS
- **Backend**: Node.js with Socket.IO for real-time multiplayer

## Contact

For questions about DAMESELITE, visit the website or contact through the app.

## How to Play

1. Visit https://dameselite.com/
2. Choose your preferred language
3. Select a game mode:
   - "Jouer contre l'IA" / "Play vs AI" for single player
   - "Deux joueurs" / "Two Players" for local multiplayer
   - "Multijoueur en ligne" / "Online Multiplayer" for online play
4. Start playing!

## Keywords

international draughts, checkers, dames, jeu de dames, damspiel, damas, board game, strategy game, online game, free game, FMJD, 10x10, multiplayer, AI opponent
